short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage Chrome tabs and groups easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify Your Browser Tabs and Boost Productivity!

Tabris is your Chrome extension for managing tabs and groups effortlessly. Whether you’re a multitasker, a researcher, or just someone tired of tab chaos, Tabris has got you covered.

Key Features:
• Auto-Group Tabs: Automatically group tabs by domain or last access time for easy organization.
• Quick Actions: Pin, mute, sort, and manage tabs with a single click.
• Tab and Group Management: Collapse, expand, or ungroup tabs in seconds.
• Privacy-Focused Design: No tracking, no data collection – your activity stays private.
• Command Palette Interface: Inspired by the simplicity of code editors, Tabris makes navigation fast and intuitive.

Why Choose Tabris?
• Declutter your browser and focus on what matters.
• Save time by managing tabs effortlessly with powerful automation tools.
• Enjoy peace of mind knowing your privacy is always respected.

Install Tabris Today!
Transform your browsing experience in minutes. Take control of your tabs, boost your productivity, and enjoy a clutter-free browser with Tabris.
